projects.title: Google Assistant Conversation Action for AUB
description: The aim of this project is to provide a voice activated information retrieval system for AUB students, faculty, and staff.
Students may authenticate their emails on their phone before using the assistant, and then ask university related questions, such as registration information, and receive personalized answers.
Scrape data from a static page using Java to store in our database.
Retrieve the information from the database according to the usersâ€™ verbal request.

projects.title: Web Application Play Store
description: The aim of this project is to create a web application that is a play store allowing users to sign up then access and download games, movies, applications, and books.
The information about each book/movie is stored in a database, and upon a user clicking on an item, it's description/cast... is shown

projects.title: Relational DBMS
description: The aim of this project is to make a relational DBMS to manage the inventory of a clothing shop.
